instruction: Generate a short piece of fiction based on the given characters.
output: Jack and Jane had been friends since childhood. They were always inseparable, and even as adults, they still kept in touch. One day, Jack invited Jane to come to his house for a visit and Jane happily agreed. When Jane arrived, Jack showed her his secret garden and the two of them spent hours exploring and talking about all the amazing things they saw. By the end of the day, it was clear that Jack and Jane had built something special, even beyond the garden.
